<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<feed xml:lang="en-US" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
  <id>tag:talkingpointsmemo.com,2005:/feed/livewire</id>
  <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire"/>
  <link rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/feed/livewire"/>
  <title>Livewire</title>
  <updated>2018-02-18T16:36:39Z</updated>
  <entry>
    <id>272961</id>
    <published>2018-02-18T11:36:39-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-18T11:49:16-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/parkland-shooting-survivors-announce-national-march-for-our-lives"/>
    <title>Parkland School Shooting Survivors Announce National 'March For Our Lives'</title>
    <content type="html"><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">A group survivors of Wednesday’s mass shooting at Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida appeared on several nationally-broadcast talk shows Sunday with a message for lawmakers: “You’re either with us or against us.” </span></p><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Those were the words of </span><span style="font-weight: 400;">Cameron Kasky, a junior at Stoneman Douglas who told CNN’s Dana Bash (and several other anchors) that students nationwide would participant in a &#8220;March For Our Lives” on March 24th, with a goal of preventing mass shootings and placing a &#8220;badge of shame&#8221; on lawmakers who accept money from the National Rifle Association.</span></p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/parkland-shooting-survivors-announce-national-march-for-our-lives" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Matt Shuham</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518971799" updated="1518972556" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/parkland-shooting-survivors-announce-national-march-for-our-lives" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/whs377xaplsq4jx5leb9.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272959</id>
    <published>2018-02-18T09:49:02-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-18T09:50:21-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attacks-congressional-dems-fbi-mcmaster-clinton-obama-schiff-and-more"/>
    <title>Trump Attacks Congressional Dems, FBI, McMaster, Clinton, Obama, Schiff, Others</title>
    <content type="html"><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">On Twitter Saturday night and Sunday morning, President Donald Trump flooded the zone with his takes on a variety of topics, all seemingly sharing one message: It’s not my fault. </span></p><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">The past week was a taxing one for the President, politically: A <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sheriff-shooter-still-at-large-after-reports-of-shooting-at-fl-high-school">mass shooting</a> in Florida increased the pressure on Congress to enact gun control legislation. Robert Mueller indicted 14 people, <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/indictment-russians-pushed-voter-fraud-mtyh">Russian</a> and <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/edblog/who-is-richard-pinedo">American</a>, on various charges in the course of his special counsel investigation &#8212; one that the administration has maintained is a “witch hunt” based on a “hoax.” And the New Yorker magazine <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-karen-mcdougal-affair-national-enquirer-deal">detailed</a> another extramarital affair the President reportedly paid to keep quiet. </span></p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attacks-congressional-dems-fbi-mcmaster-clinton-obama-schiff-and-more" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Matt Shuham</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518965342" updated="1518965421" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attacks-congressional-dems-fbi-mcmaster-clinton-obama-schiff-and-more" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/tknsvt4heqpxsdnkfwta.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272957</id>
    <published>2018-02-17T17:11:38-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-17T17:11:40-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sessions-orders-review-fbi-inaction-tip-shooter"/>
    <title>Sessions Orders Review Of FBI Inaction On Tip About Suspected Florida Shooter</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Friday said he would conduct a review of the FBI&#8217;s failure to investigate a tip it received in January warning the bureau about the behavior of the 19-year-old charged with killing 17 people in a Florida school shooting Wednesday.</p><p>In a statement, Sessions said he would make the review of the FBI and the Department of Justice&#8217;s practices &#8220;a top priority.&#8221;</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sessions-orders-review-fbi-inaction-tip-shooter" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518905498" updated="1518905500" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sessions-orders-review-fbi-inaction-tip-shooter" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/fp2h3guowxibm39hvrrt.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272956</id>
    <published>2018-02-17T16:55:05-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-17T16:57:00-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-facebook-exec-attack-media"/>
    <title>Trump Uses Facebook Execs Tweet To Attack Media On Russia Coverage</title>
    <content type="html"><p>President Donald Trump on Saturday pointed to tweets from Facebook&#8217;s advertising executive to attack the media&#8217;s coverage of the Russia investigation and again claim that he&#8217;s innocent of collusion.</p><p>In a series of tweets on Saturday, Trump taunted the &#8220;Fake News Media&#8221; for not reporting that the &#8220;Russian group&#8221; that was indicted by special counsel Robert Mueller for interfering in the 2016 election Friday was formed in 2014.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-facebook-exec-attack-media" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518904505" updated="1518904620" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-facebook-exec-attack-media" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/lgznsgalsqxi6ai9whil.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272951</id>
    <published>2018-02-17T10:50:10-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-17T10:50:12-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/clinton-silent-indictment-spox-trump-unamerican"/>
    <title>Clinton Silent On Russia Indictment, Spox Calls Trump 'Un-American'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>While former Secretary of State and President Trump opponent Hillary Clinton remained silent on news of an indictment against 13 Russian nationals for interfering in the 2016 election, her spokesperson lashed out on Trump on Twitter, calling him &#8220;un-American.&#8221;</p><p>&#8220;Time will tell us more, but Russia went to great lengths to undermine our democracy and the President won&#8217;t protect us,&#8221; he said. &#8220;No matter you politics, it&#8217;s un-American.&#8221;</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/clinton-silent-indictment-spox-trump-unamerican" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518882610" updated="1518882612" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/clinton-silent-indictment-spox-trump-unamerican" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/paqpxgl6eyroqc20asp7.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272949</id>
    <published>2018-02-17T10:10:35-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-17T10:10:37-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-first-responders-injured-shooting"/>
    <title>Trump In Florida: 'You Can Count On' Action To Prevent Future Shootings</title>
    <content type="html"><p>POMPANO BEACH, Fla. (AP) — President Donald Trump has made a grim trip to a Florida community reeling from a deadly school shooting, meeting privately with victims and cheering the heroics of first responders.</p><p>But he extended few public words of consolation to those in deep mourning, nor did Trump address the debate over gun violence that has raged since a 19-year-old gunman killed 17 and injured 14 others.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-first-responders-injured-shooting" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>CATHERINE LUCEY and KEN THOMAS</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518880235" updated="1518880237" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-first-responders-injured-shooting" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/m0xpsedbj50zin9egrvw.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272943</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T17:47:31-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T17:47:34-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-mueller-indictment-is-positive-step-to-prevent-future-interference"/>
    <title>Rubio: Mueller Indictment Is 'A Positive First Step' To Prevent Future Meddling</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Sen. Marco Rubio (R-FL) on Friday said that special counsel Robert Mueller&#8217;s <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/mueller-indicts-thirteen-russian-nationals-three-russian-entities-election-hacking">indictment</a> of 13 Russian nationals and three Russian entities was &#8220;a positive first step toward deterring future Russian meddling in our elections.&#8221;</p><p>&#8220;Today’s indictments clearly demonstrates that Vladimir Putin is neither a Democrat nor a Republican — this is not a partisan issue, and we cannot allow a foreign country to actively interfere in our political dialogue and divide us as a nation against each other,” Rubio said in a statement.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-mueller-indictment-is-positive-step-to-prevent-future-interference" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Esme Cribb</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518821251" updated="1518821254" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-mueller-indictment-is-positive-step-to-prevent-future-interference" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/ydhwdjbqfovku7gzen9r.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272937</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T16:19:12-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T16:19:15-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nunes-gratifying-to-see-russians-indicted-for-election-meddling-mueller"/>
    <title>Nunes: Mueller's Indictment Of Russians For Election Meddling Is 'Gratifying'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>House Intelligence Committee Chair Devin Nunes (R-CA) on Friday said it was &#8220;gratifying to see&#8221; special counsel Robert Mueller&#8217;s indictment of &#8220;Russian agents&#8221; who allegedly interfered with the 2016 election.</p><p>“The Putin regime presents a pressing threat to American interests, including through Moscow’s long-running influence operations against the United States,&#8221; Nunes said in a statement. &#8220;Although the Obama Administration failed to act on the Committee’s warnings, it’s gratifying to see that Russian agents involved in these operations have now been identified and indicted.”</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nunes-gratifying-to-see-russians-indicted-for-election-meddling-mueller" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Esme Cribb</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518815952" updated="1518815955" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nunes-gratifying-to-see-russians-indicted-for-election-meddling-mueller" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/a6kfla78mq2p8b2mlw57.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272934</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T16:00:29-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T16:09:46-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-white-house-claim-mueller-indictment-is-proof-of-no-collusion"/>
    <title>Trump, White House Seize On Mueller Indictment As Proof Of 'NO COLLUSION'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>President Donald Trump on Friday insisted that special counsel Robert Mueller&#8217;s <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/mueller-indicts-thirteen-russian-nationals-three-russian-entities-election-hacking">indictment</a> of 13 Russians and three Russian entities supported his claim that there was &#8220;no collusion&#8221; between members of his campaign and Russia.</p><p>&#8220;Russia started their anti-US campaign in 2014, long before I announced that I would run for President,&#8221; he tweeted. &#8220;The Trump campaign did nothing wrong &#8211; no collusion!&#8221;</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-white-house-claim-mueller-indictment-is-proof-of-no-collusion" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Esme Cribb</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518814829" updated="1518815386" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-white-house-claim-mueller-indictment-is-proof-of-no-collusion" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/q2uxck1lqlpuaef6eotq.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272933</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T15:36:03-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T15:36:05-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/florida-gov-demands-fbi-director-resign-shooting"/>
    <title>Florida Gov Demands FBI Director Wray Resign Over Inaction On Shooter Tip</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Florida Gov. Rick Scott (R) on Friday said that FBI Director Chris Wray should resign over the bureau&#8217;s failure to act on a tip it received in January about the alleged gunman who attacked a Florida high school on Wednesday, leaving 17 people dead.</p><p>“The FBI’s failure to take action against this killer is unacceptable,” Scott said in a statement. “We constantly promote ‘see something, say something,’ and a courageous person did just that to the FBI. And the FBI failed to act. ‘See something, say something’ is an incredibly important tool and people must have confidence in the follow through from law enforcement. The FBI director needs to resign.”</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/florida-gov-demands-fbi-director-resign-shooting" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518813363" updated="1518813365" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/florida-gov-demands-fbi-director-resign-shooting" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/gvhcasjdirdsw91206f6.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272932</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T15:34:35-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T15:34:38-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/democrats-mueller-indictment-vindicate-russia-probes"/>
    <title>Top Dems: Mueller's Latest Indictment Vindicates Russian Meddling Probes</title>
    <content type="html"><p>After special counsel Robert Mueller on Friday announced that 13 Russian individuals and three Russian entities have been indicted as part of the federal Russia probe, top Democrats in Congress said the indictment shows the importance of letting the investigations into Russian election meddling continue uninhibited.</p><p>The lengthy <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/mueller-indicts-thirteen-russian-nationals-three-russian-entities-election-hacking">indictment</a> from Mueller&#8217;s grand jury lays out how Russians systematically worked to interfere in the 2016 election by setting up social media accounts and posing as Americans.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/democrats-mueller-indictment-vindicate-russia-probes" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518813275" updated="1518813278" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/democrats-mueller-indictment-vindicate-russia-probes" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/syshiksdrwotr3evu3rt.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272931</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T15:09:57-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T15:11:52-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-mueller-indictment-response-russia-election-meddling"/>
    <title>Ryan: Mueller Indictment Shows 'Extent Of The Subterfuge' In Russian Meddling</title>
    <content type="html"><p>House Majority Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI) on Friday said special counsel Robert Mueller&#8217;s <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/mueller-indicts-thirteen-russian-nationals-three-russian-entities-election-hacking">bombshell indictment</a> of 13 Russians indicates &#8220;the extent of the subterfuge&#8221; that Russia undertook to meddle in the 2016 U.S. presidential election.</p><p>&#8220;We have known that Russia meddled in the election, but these indictments detail the extent of the subterfuge,&#8221; Ryan said in a <a href="https://www.speaker.gov/press-release/statement-doj-indictments-against-russian-nationals-and-entities">statement</a>. &#8220;Today’s announcement underscores why we need to follow the facts and work to protect the integrity of future elections.&#8221;</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-mueller-indictment-response-russia-election-meddling" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Cristina Cabrera</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518811797" updated="1518811912" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-mueller-indictment-response-russia-election-meddling" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/fzgx2rww5yvdg1oev02e.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272930</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T15:02:14-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T15:02:18-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sasse-mueller-put-moscow-on-notice"/>
    <title>Sasse: Mueller ‘Just Put Moscow On Notice’ With Indictment Of 13 Russians</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Sen. Ben Sasse (R-NE) on Friday said special counsel Robert Mueller &#8220;put Moscow on notice&#8221; when he announced an indictment of 13 Russian nationals as part of the federal probe into Russian election interference.</p><p>“Mueller just put Moscow on notice. This ought to be a wakeup call to Washington: Putin’s shadow war is aimed at undermining Americans’ trust in our institutions,” Sasse said in a <a href="https://outreach.senate.gov/iqextranet/view_newsletter.aspx?id=101455&amp;c=SenSasse">statement</a>. “We know Russia is coming back in 2018 and 2020 – we have to take this threat seriously.”</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sasse-mueller-put-moscow-on-notice" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518811334" updated="1518811338" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/sasse-mueller-put-moscow-on-notice" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/mchxu07mg4dwg1bzcrsd.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272927</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T14:09:19-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T14:09:28-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/watch-rosenstein-announces-indictments-federal-probe-russian-election-meddling"/>
    <title>WATCH: Rosenstein Announces Indictments For Russian Election Meddling</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein on Friday announced that a grand jury working with special counsel Robert Mueller has <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/muckraker/mueller-indicts-thirteen-russian-nationals-three-russian-entities-election-hacking">indicted 13 Russian nationals</a> and three Russian entities as part of the federal investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election. Watch:</p><p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pe06Q2YpGMI" width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"><span data-mce-type="bookmark" style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;" class="mce_SELRES_start">﻿</span></iframe></p> </content>
    <author>
      <name>Esme Cribb</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518808159" updated="1518808168" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/watch-rosenstein-announces-indictments-federal-probe-russian-election-meddling" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/zzpnyq5qhayopvzwf1qi.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272924</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T13:13:56-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T14:39:42-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/former-trump-spokeperson-corallo-meets-with-mueller"/>
    <title>Reports: Trump's Former Legal Spokesman Met With Mueller's Team</title>
    <content type="html"><p>President Donald Trump&#8217;s former legal spokesperson Mark Corallo met with special counsel Robert Mueller&#8217;s team, the Daily Beast and NBC News reported on Friday.</p><p>The Daily Beast <a href="https://www.thedailybeast.com/mueller-has-interviewed-trump-legal-teams-former-spokesman">reported</a>, citing two unnamed sources familiar with the matter, that Corallo spoke with Mueller for more than two hours.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/former-trump-spokeperson-corallo-meets-with-mueller" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Summer Concepcion</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518804836" updated="1518809982" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/former-trump-spokeperson-corallo-meets-with-mueller" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/gisvmofodiovolstxaoe.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272921</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T13:04:25-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T13:04:27-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/televangelist-trump-surrogate-announces-bid-gowdy-seat"/>
    <title>Trump-Backing Televangelist Pastor Announces Bid For Gowdy’s House Seat</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Televangelist pastor Mark Burns, who acted as a surrogate for Donald Trump during the 2016 presidential election, on Thursday announced that he will run for the seat Rep. Trey Gowdy (R-SC) will vacate when he retires this year.</p><p>Burns rose to prominence during Trump’s 2016 campaign as one of his most vocal African American supporters, and has a history of minor controversies. In fall 2016, he issued public apologies twice in one week — once for posting a cartoon that depicted <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/mark-burns-apologizes-tweet">Hillary Clinton in blackface</a> and <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/mark-burns-fabrications-personal-biography">again</a> for exaggerating his resume on his church’s website after CNN pointed out the discrepancies during an interview.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/televangelist-trump-surrogate-announces-bid-gowdy-seat" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518804265" updated="1518804267" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/televangelist-trump-surrogate-announces-bid-gowdy-seat" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/xbtlvqzwee1y7y2hhlhb.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272917</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T11:16:31-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T11:16:33-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-karen-mcdougal-affair-national-enquirer-deal"/>
    <title>Report Reveals How Trump's Lackeys Quashed Stories Of Alleged Affairs</title>
    <content type="html"><p>A report out from the <a href="https://www.newyorker.com/news/news-desk/donald-trump-a-playboy-model-and-a-system-for-concealing-infidelity-national-enquirer-karen-mcdougal">New Yorker</a> Friday morning about President Donald Trump&#8217;s alleged affair with model Karen McDougal more than a decade ago shows how Trump&#8217;s allies paid women who had affairs with him to stay silent.</p><p>Trump and McDougal began an affair in 2006 after he met her at a party at the Playboy Mansion in Los Angeles, where he taped an episode of &#8220;The Apprentice,&#8221; according to notes about their relationship the New Yorker <a href="https://www.newyorker.com/news/news-desk/donald-trump-a-playboy-model-and-a-system-for-concealing-infidelity-national-enquirer-karen-mcdougal">obtained</a> from McDougal.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-karen-mcdougal-affair-national-enquirer-deal" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518797791" updated="1518797793" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-karen-mcdougal-affair-national-enquirer-deal" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/mc2kj5y1ihcxphwv16iw.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272916</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T11:06:57-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T11:09:14-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attack-democrats-daca-totally-abandoned"/>
    <title>Trump Claims Dems Are To Blame For 'Totally' Abandoning DACA Recipients</title>
    <content type="html"><p>President Donald Trump on Friday claimed that Democrats are to blame for &#8220;how BADLY DACA recipients have been treated&#8221; by Congress after the Senate <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/dc/immigration-votes-senate-daca">failed</a> to vote on a bill to protect the undocumented immigrants brought to the U.S as children.</p><p lang="en" dir="ltr">Cannot believe how BADLY DACA recipients have been treated by the Democrats&#8230;totally abandoned! Republicans are still working hard.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attack-democrats-daca-totally-abandoned" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Cristina Cabrera</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518797217" updated="1518797354" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-attack-democrats-daca-totally-abandoned" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/xcl9aghjvyfluewwmrj0.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272911</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T09:11:02-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T09:36:38-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nyt-va-secretary-investigating-staff-suspects-undermining-him"/>
    <title>NYT: VA Secretary Investigating Staff Who He Suspects Are Undermining Him</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Secretary of Veterans Affairs David Shulkin said Wednesday that he is investigating President Donald Trump-appointed members of his staff who he believes are “trying to undermine the department from within.”</p><p>Shulkin told the New York Times in an <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2018/02/15/us/veterans-affairs-david-shulkin.html">interview</a> published Thursday that he spoke directly to White House chief of staff John Kelly about the issue and is investigating several political appointees in his department for misconduct and potential removal.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nyt-va-secretary-investigating-staff-suspects-undermining-him" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Nicole Lafond</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518790262" updated="1518791798" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/nyt-va-secretary-investigating-staff-suspects-undermining-him" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/fppshlxkuviyl8e9ahe2.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>272910</id>
    <published>2018-02-16T08:38:03-05:00</published>
    <updated>2018-02-16T09:58:28-05:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/romney-launches-senate-bid"/>
    <title>Mitt Romney Officially Launches Utah Senate Bid</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Mitt Romney on Friday morning officially announced that he would run for the open Senate seat representing Utah that retiring Sen. Orrin Hatch (R-UT) will vacate at the end of the year.</p><p>Romney&#8217;s announcement was expected this week, but was delayed by a day following a <a href="https://talkingpointsmemo.com/news/17-killed-deadliest-school-shooting-since-newtown">deadly school shooting</a> in Florida.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/romney-launches-senate-bid" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1518788283" updated="1518793108" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/romney-launches-senate-bid" image="http://a1.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/mieyabhuvpy5bw3xlewi.jpg"/>
  </entry>
